simmasto0

Class C_Raster

  • java.lang.Object
    • simmasto0.C_Raster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_string_constants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    C_RasterGraph

    public class C_Raster
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_string_constants
    Read values from matrix. It can be an ASCII text grid or an image raster. (the image must be in grey levels or in 256 or less colors)
    Author:
    Baduel 2009.04, Le Fur 2009.12, Longueville 2011.02, Le Fur 02.2011, 07.2012, 04.2015

      • addChildAgent

        public void addChildAgent(A_Animal parent,
                 A_Animal child)
        Addition of new agent in simulation. The agent is not sexed in this method. And get the position of it's "parents".
        Parameters:
        parent - this parameter is the parents agent
        child - this parameter is the new agent it's sex can be provided by its type on February 2011

      • findObjectsOnContinuousSpace

        public java.util.TreeSet<I_situated_thing> findObjectsOnContinuousSpace(I_situated_thing thing,
                                                               double radius_Umeter)
        This method provides the list of all perceptible things in a radius of vision_Umeter. This method deals with gridcells (i.e., C_SoilCell); we convert the vision of the agent from a vision in meter to a vision in cells then we obtain the field agent associated to the concerned cells. We then keep only those within their perpeption radius
        Parameters:
        thing - : I_situated_thing
        radius_Umeter - the perception sphere of agent
        Returns:
        list of situated things

        CAUTION This method is a patch : using this procedure should be accompanied with the various list update necessary (see previous uses for help)- JEL/JLF 2011, PAM 2013
        Parameters:

        coordonee_Ucs - Coordinate

      • moveByDisplacement

        public void moveByDisplacement(A_VisibleAgent thing,
                      com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate moveDistance_Umeters)
        Moves the agent on the continuous space p_Ucell.getX() + (int) (distanceDeplacement_Ucs.x / SPACE_CELL_SIZE_UCS), Remark: The ground manager may change the requested move to match the field constraint Link between raster and continuous space
        Parameters:
        thing - A_Animal
        moveDistance_Umeters - Coordinate in meters SI units

      • identifyAffinityLandPlots

        public java.util.TreeSet<C_LandPlot> identifyAffinityLandPlots(repast.simphony.context.Context<java.lang.Object> context)
        Scan all SoilCells and allocate them to a given landPlot, create a new one each time it changes.
        This method doesn't update old landPlots but it builds new ones. And old ones remain in the context.
        If necessary, it is possible to "update" the old see (C_RasterGraphManager.identifyTypeLandPlots()).
        25/09/2013
        Parameters:
        context -
        See Also:
        C_RasterGraph.identifyTypeLandPlots(java.lang.String)
